title: Can I read any book on Kindle? - Quora

response.answer_text: On a kindle you can get on Amazon or any department store like Target or Best Buy. Kindle books can be bought on Amazon. Most are very inexpensive. I pay for Kindle Unlimited which means I can read as many books as I want that are offered free on Kindle Unlimited. I can have ten books out for loan at once on Kindle Unlimited.

You can read Kindle books online on the Kindle Cloud reader, or get an app for your desktop/MAC or the app for your smartphone. Alternatively get a dedicated Kindle Paperwhite reader, or an Amazone Fire device.
Though intended to be read on the Kindle, they can also be read on any devices loaded with the Kindle app, available for free on the net.
